short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspect URLs and identify malicious activity with RiskIQ!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables the Chrome browser to serve as a collection source for RiskIQ crawlers. RiskIQ customers can configure this extension with their API credentials in order to perform crawls, query for results and turn on various collection methods.
